ygData.subject: Re: Anger, attack and astonishment
ygData.msgSnippet: No, it will not grow, Child. There is no way we can stand and fight them. You have not been trained to you use the Convix. You might lose part of the message.

"No, it will not grow, Child. There is no way we can stand and fight 
them. You have not been trained to you use the Convix. You might lose 
part of the message. I know I have many times.(He than turns to 
Gigatron) I will make you a deal. Go back to The Keepers. When we are 
ready to go to The Alliance base, I will call for you. We may yet 
need your help. Is this offer acceptable?
